alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:53AM CDT until April 05 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Leake County in central Mississippi... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northern Smith County in central Mississippi... Scott County in central Mississippi... Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 730 AM CDT. * At 553 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Little Yazoo to near Rocky Springs, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Flora around 600 AM CDT. Annandale around 610 AM CDT. Canton, Dry Grove and Gluckstadt around 615 AM CDT. Terry around 625 AM CDT. Whites around 630 AM CDT. Florence around 635 AM CDT. Star and Ludlow around 640 AM CDT. Piney Woods around 645 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Polkville, Lake, Sebastopol, Learned and Puckett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central, southwestern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Smith
